meta.title: SMS Middleware Platform - Professional SMS Verification Service
meta.description: Professional SMS verification middleware platform providing global SMS receiving and mobile number rental services
meta.keywords: SMS verification,SMS validation,mobile number rental,SMS receiving,verification code

services.serviceDescription: Select service platform and country/region, we will provide you with temporary phone numbers to receive SMS verification codes. Supporting global mainstream platforms, fast and stable, transparent pricing.

services.serviceInstructionsDescription: After confirmation, the system will allocate a temporary phone number for you. You can use this number to receive SMS verification codes. The number will be recycled after service completion.

rentals.rentalDescription: Rent a phone number for a period of time to receive multiple SMS messages. Suitable for scenarios requiring continuous verification or multiple registrations. Flexible rental duration, real-time SMS reception, secure and reliable.
rentals.searchServiceNameOrDescription: Search service name or description (supports Chinese and English)
rentals.customDurationDescription: Custom duration pricing is calculated in tiers, with rates over 72 hours calculated at 7x
rentals.searchCountryName: Search country name (supports Chinese and English)
rentals.rentalInstructionsDescription: During the rental period, you will receive a dedicated phone number that can receive multiple SMS messages. After the rental period ends, the number will be automatically recycled. If you need to extend the rental time, please renew before expiration.
rentals.rentalOrderFailed: Rental order creation failed, please try again
rentals.manageRentalRecords: Manage your phone number rental records, view messages and extend rental time
rentals.confirmCancelRentalQuestion: Are you sure you want to cancel this rental?
rentals.cancelRentalWarning: Note: Rentals cannot be cancelled after 20 minutes, a 10% fee will be charged for cancellation.
rentals.confirmFinishRentalQuestion: Are you sure you want to finish this rental?
rentals.finishRentalWarning: After finishing, you will no longer be able to receive SMS messages.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this SMS verification service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Our service provides temporary phone numbers for SMS verification purposes. Users can rent phone numbers for a limited time to receive SMS verification codes from various online services. We act as an intermediary service and do not control the content or timing of SMS messages received.

userAccount.title: 3. User Account
userAccount.content: To use our service, you must create an account with accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree to use our service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You may not use our service for any illegal activities, fraud, harassment, or any other activities that violate applicable laws or regulations. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

payment.title: 5. Payment and Refunds
payment.content: Payment for services must be made in advance. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise specified. We reserve the right to change our pricing at any time with notice. Refunds may be provided at our sole discretion for technical issues or service failures.

privacy.title: 6. Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service, to understand our practices regarding the collection and use of your personal information.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The service is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components.

limitation.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the service.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the terms.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our support channels.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our SMS verification service. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the service.

informationCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a payment, or contact us for support. This may include your username, email address, payment information, and any communications you have with us.

informationUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send you technical notices and support messages, and communicate with you about products, services, and promotional offers.

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy. We may share your information in certain limited circumstances, such as to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

userRights.title: 7. Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you. You may also have the right to restrict or object to certain processing of your personal information, and the right to data portability.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'last updated' date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our support channels.
